# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a Jack Frank's homebrew version of Basic Fantasy made for his Wistful World of OnceWas campaign.  For the original game by Chris Gonnerman please refer to:  the [Basic Fantasy Role-Playing Game](https://www.basicfantasy.org)
